Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we are confident it will meet your needs and expectations. To make this opportunity accessible to you, I am offering the product at an exclusive price of $1200000. This offer is tailored to provide you with substantial savings compared to market rates while ensuring you receive the best value for your investment. We are committed to supporting your business growth and look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us. Thank you for considering our product, and we hope to have the pleasure of serving you soon. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
